snippet: Democrats who endorsed Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey received big financial payouts for their towns; Democrats who did not suffered reprisals.
abstract: Editorial criticizes New Jersey Gov Chris Christie for failing to address unanswered questions in his State of the State speech; holds there is no diverting attention away from fact that he and his close advisers have used his office to mete out rewards or punishment for political reasons;says Christie faces questions not only about political retribution, but also about his use of funds designated for Hurricane Sandy relief.
lead_paragraph: Democrats who endorsed Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey received big financial payouts for their towns; Democrats who did not suffered reprisals.
